question: When you have a shared document, how does OneDrive handle document versions?
options: OneDrive automatically deletes older versions to save storage space.
Each user needs to manually create versions of the document.
OneDrive saves a new version whenever changes are made, allowing users to view and restore previous versions.
Users have to download and save different versions separately.
answer: OneDrive saves a new version whenever changes are made, allowing users to view and restore previous versions.

question: What option should Frederick choose to control the level of access when sharing a document with Gary on one drive?
options: Send a Copy with restricted editing options.
Can View to limit Gary's ability to edit the document.
Anyone with the link can edit for broad access.
Direct Access to enable real-time collaboration.
answer: Can View to limit Gary's ability to edit the document.

question: Adding a button or a keyboard shortcut to a macro in Microsoft Word will help to ___________________________.
options: eliminate the need to create a macro.
create complex code for programming tasks.
replace existing buttons so you can make your own tab.
save time and streamline your workflow.
answer: save time and streamline your workflow.

question: Harley is working on a file that she is using to record her monthly expenses. She would like her spreadsheet to be able to add up and display the grand total of how much she has spent this month on eating out. She can do this simply in Excel by _______________________.
options: doing mental math
making use of the SUBTOTAL function
using the TotalSum feature
downloading a template that will allow her to automatically display the grand total of a list of values
answer: making use of the SUBTOTAL function

question: What is the primary advantage of using search folders in Outlook?
options: Search folders allow you to sort your emails by sender or recipient.
Search folders automatically delete emails that match specific criteria.
Search folders provide an easy way to view emails based on predefined search criteria without the need for repeated manual searches.
Search folders prevent flagged emails from appearing in your inbox.
answer: Search folders provide an easy way to view emails based on predefined search criteria without the need for repeated manual searches.

question: What is the file extension for an Outlook email template?
options: .oft
.ost
.pst
.msg
answer: .oft

question: Ramy has created a PowerPoint slideshow. During her review, she noticed that each slide had a different layout. Which tool will assist her in making consistent changes throughout her presentation?
options: Edit Slides
Slide Master
Unify Slides
Constant Content
answer: Slide Master

question: Which of the following choices is NOT a Media Playback option in PowerPoint?
options: Present Online
Add Bookmark
Fade Duration
Loop Until Stopped
answer: Present Online

question: Which of the following features is NOT available in the Microsoft Teams mobile app?
options: Participating in video meetings and screen sharing
Editing Office documents within the app
Scheduling meetings and sending meeting invitations
Accessing and managing team channels and chats
answer: Editing Office documents within the app

question: How can you quickly join a Teams meeting from your mobile device?
options: Open the Teams app and tap on the "Join" button in the bottom navigation bar
Search for the meeting in your calendar and tap on the "Join" link
Ask a colleague to share the meeting link, which you can then open in the Teams app
Both a and b are correct ways to join a Teams meeting from your mobile device
answer: Both a and b are correct ways to join a Teams meeting from your mobile device

question: Which of the following is the recommended first step when creating a new Power BI project?
options: Connect to data sources
Create reports
Build a data model
Publish to the Power BI service
answer: Connect to data sources

question: How can you share your Power BI reports and dashboards with colleagues?
options: Email the report or dashboard file as an attachment
Publish the reports and dashboards to the Power BI service and grant access
Copy and paste the report or dashboard into a Word document
Save the report or dashboard to a shared network drive
answer: Publish the reports and dashboards to the Power BI service and grant access

question: How can you share a plan with others in Microsoft Planner?
options: Email the plan as an attachment
Share the plan link and grant access to specific individuals or groups
Save the plan to a shared network drive
Export the plan as a PDF and distribute it
answer: Share the plan link and grant access to specific individuals or groups

question: Which of the following is NOT a feature of Microsoft Planner?
options: Creating and assigning tasks
Setting due dates and reminders for tasks
Integrating with other Microsoft 365 applications like Teams and Outlook
Automatically generating Gantt charts for project schedules
answer: Automatically generating Gantt charts for project schedules

question: With using SharePoint Pro, what is the benefit of creating views in a list or library?
options: It allows users to only see certain items in a list or library.
It allows users to edit items in a list or library.
It allows users to create new lists or libraries.
It allows users to change the theme of a list or library.
answer: It allows users to only see certain items in a list or library.

question: What does banding of the rows in a list or library mean in SharePoint?
options: Changing the font size of every other row
Adding borders to every other row
Alternating row fill color
Changing the text color of every other row
answer: Alternating row fill color

question: What is the primary purpose of a Remote Access Trojan (RAT)?
options: To launch distributed denial-of-service (DDoS) attacks on targeted systems
To encrypt files and demand a ransom payment for decryption
To gain unauthorized remote control over a compromised system
To spread itself to other systems on the network for widespread infection
answer: To gain unauthorized remote control over a compromised system

question: Which of the following techniques is commonly used by attackers in voice phishing (vishing) attacks?
options: Spoofing the caller ID to appear as a legitimate organization or authority
Sending large volumes of automated voice calls to randomly generated phone numbers
Exploiting software vulnerabilities in Voice over IP (VoIP) systems
Brute-forcing phone numbers to gain unauthorized access to voicemail systems
answer: Spoofing the caller ID to appear as a legitimate organization or authority

question: Stir or shaken is best described as _______.
options: Technology used to trace the origin of robocalls
A method the government uses to fine carriers who are not stringent enough on robocallers
A filter to block robocalls
A technology that overloads the robocallers with robocalls that prevents them from placing calls
answer: Technology used to trace the origin of robocalls

question: What is the primary purpose of conducting regular vulnerability assessments and penetration testing?
options: To comply with industry regulations and avoid potential fines
To identify and remediate security vulnerabilities before they can be exploited
To train employees on recognizing and responding to cyber threats
To implement new security solutions and technologies
answer: To identify and remediate security vulnerabilities before they can be exploited
